start.annotation: Never again would birds' song be the same

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr r09_line

LMNL.text: That the birds there in all the garden round

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr r10_line

LMNL.text: Had gathered from the day-long voice of Eve

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r05_quatrain r08_phr r11_line

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r17_s r18_phr r20_line

LMNL.text: Could only have been taken up by birds

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r17_s r18_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r13_quatrain r17_s r18_phr r21_line

LMNL.text: When call or laughter carried them aloft.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r23_quatrain r24_line r25_s r26_phr

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r23_quatrain r28_s r29_line r31_phr

LMNL.text: her voice upon their voices crossed

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r23_quatrain r28_s r31_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r23_quatrain r28_s r31_phr r32_line

LMNL.text: Had now re-echoed in the woods so long

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r23_quatrain r28_s r31_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r23_quatrain r28_s r31_phr r33_line

LMNL.text: That probably they never would be lost.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r34_couplet r35_line r36_s r37_phr

LMNL.text: Never again would birds' song be the same.

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r22_sestet r34_couplet r38_line r39_s r40_phr

LMNL.text: And to do that to birds,
